parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[Image:sphere_radius.jpg|right|200px]]
Finds entities inside a sphere with the given radius. If the alternative syntax is used, only entities of given types or subtypes are listed. Entities returned are not sorted by distance. This command doesn't return dead entities or entities inside vehicles. If you need to return those, use [[entities]] command.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command is much [[Code_Optimisation#nearEntities_and_nearestObjects | faster]] than [[nearestObjects]] for on-foot soldier and vehicle detection.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> position [[nearEntities]] radius

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]] - center of the sphere

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - radius of the sphere

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object|Objects]] - not sorted

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> position [[nearEntities]] [type, radius]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]] - center of the sphere

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [type, radius]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> type: [[String]] or [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]] - type(s) to search for

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - radius of the sphere

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Object|Objects]] - not sorted
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_list = [[player]] [[nearEntities]] 20;
_list = [[ASLToAGL]] [[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[nearEntities]] 50;
_list = [[player]] [[nearEntities]] ["Man", 1000];
_list = [[ASLToAGL]] [[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[nearEntities]] ["LaserTarget", 3000];
_list = [[player]] [[nearEntities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["Car", "Motorcycle", "Tank"], 50];
_list = [[ASLToAGL]] [[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[nearEntities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["Man", "Air", "Car", "Motorcycle", "Tank"], 200];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[entities]], [[findNearestEnemy]], [[nearestBuilding]], [[nearestObject]], [[nearestObjects]], [[nearObjects]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearTargets]], [[nearSupplies]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[nearObjectsReady]], [[nearRoads]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
